Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) are considered the most important in the field of fuel cells.
Titulo: Improved data driven model free adaptive constrained control for a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: However, SOFCs give a challenging control problem due to their slow dynamics, complex non-linearity, and operating constraints.
Titulo: Improved data driven model free adaptive constrained control for a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In this study, an improved model free adaptive constrained control scheme is proposed to solve the SOFC control problem with I/O measurement data.
Titulo: Improved data driven model free adaptive constrained control for a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Since the control terms appear within the unknown non-linear dynamic, an improved compact form dynamic linearisation data driven modelling method is used to simplify the SOFC system.
Titulo: Improved data driven model free adaptive constrained control for a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In the design procedure of the controller, a novel dynamic anti-windup compensator is used to deal with the move magnitude and rate saturations of SOFC control input.
Titulo: Improved data driven model free adaptive constrained control for a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Moreover, the authors also theoretically prove that all the signals in the closed-loop system are uniformly ultimately bounded based on Lyapunov stability analysis method.
Titulo: Improved data driven model free adaptive constrained control for a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Finally, simulation results are given to demonstrate the effectiveness and potential of the proposed constrained control scheme.
Titulo: Improved data driven model free adaptive constrained control for a solid oxide fuel cell
